main.name: Babou360
main.description: I am a App development engineer and I use Flutter and a little bit of Reactjs to develop Apps. This Page is thereby here to showcase what i kind of do so you know where i stand in case you wish to work with me
main.bio: I am Amri Mkilanya(Babou) born and raised in the city of Arusha Tanzania i went to Sombetini for primary and secondary and Minaki for Advanced secondary education then to University of Dodoma at the college of Informatics and virtual Education and i was in the school of Virtual education where i graduated in 2019 but did not attend the graduation ceremony  .
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I was only a shy little kid the first time i joined the institution i did not even know how to use computer i remember a friend of mine used to laugh at me because i was scared to even touch his but i grew up there and became somehow an expert until today
This is indeed the first and last boarding school i've ever attended it is in Kisarawe a District in Pwani Region

education.degree: All Subjects except Business from form 3 up to 4
education.description: The closest school i've ever attended it is only like 30 metres away from home and it's during this time when i had the best moment of my life growing up as a kid and made lots of friends too in short i enjoyed every second of it

The most dificult moment of my life as a student i did not like the way kids were treated at this school heavy beatings from teachers i cannot remember a single day going back and forth without getting a single stick present from these teachers and trust me this was too much for a little kid to take
